title: Sam Smith makes out with mystery partner while partying in Las Vegas
text:
Sam Smith was spotted passionately making out with a mystery person while partying in Las Vegas.

The 27-year-old British singer, who recently changed his pronouns to 'they and them' after coming out as nonbinary, was snapped locking lips with an unknown partner at Quadz, a 24-hour gay club, last month.

In footage obtained by DailyMail.com, Smith is seen gyrating and kissing a man at 6.15 in the morning.

Scroll down for video

Steamy: Sam Smith locked lips with a mystery partner during a 'wild night' out in Las Vegas last month

Mystery man: Footage obtained exclusively by DailyMail.com shows the 27-year-old British singer gyrating and making out with the man at 24-hour gay club, Quadz

And in another video from that night, the 'Stay with Me' singer is dancing alone in front of semi-naked podium dancer.

'It was a wild night,' said the eyewitness who captured the steamy moment.

'We were all at Piranha Nightclub first, that's another gay bar, then we moved across the street to Quadz.

'Sam appeared drunk, hitting on my husband first, then moved over to that guy and they started making out immediately.

'Sam met that guy in Quadz, they had known each other for maybe a minute or two prior to that moment.

'I thought it was really funny because Sam was bouncing around so much.

Dancing the night away: At one point, Smith was seen having a good time and dancing in front of semi-naked podium dancer

Party time: Sam paired a white tank top with slacks and belt for the night out

A witness who captured the moment claimed Smith had more than one steamy encounter st the club that night

The single life: Smith dated 13 Reasons Why Star Brandon Flynn (pictured together at the 2018 Grammy Awards, but the two split last summer after nine months

'They didn't go home together, Sam ended up leaving with [their] manager.

'I heard [their] manager tell [them] that [they were] too drunk and said, "all right it's time to go home."'

The source claimed other eyewitnesses at the club, including the club's manager, saw Smith making out with more than one person that night.

Earlier this month, the Grammy-winning singer attended the Virgin Atlantic Attitude Awards in London, where they admitted 2019 felt like 'a wild ride of self-realization, and has almost felt like a second coming out.'

Adding: 'The reason I've been able to show all of the sides of myself to the public, and express myself in these ways, is because I felt incredibly safe.'

Smith has been romantically linked to 13 Reasons Why star Brandon Flynn, 26, but the pair split last June after nine months of dating.
description: Sam Smith, who recently changed his pronouns to 'they and them' after coming out as nonbinary, was snapped locking lips with an unknown partner at 24-hour gay club, Quadz in Las Vegas.
